江に: (えに) - fate/destiny (esp. as a mysterious force that binds two people together); relationship (e.g. between two people)/bond/link/connection; family ties/affinity; (えん only) opportunity/chance (to meet someone and start a relationship); (えん only)   pratyaya (indirect conditions, as opposed to direct causes); (えん only) (also written as 椽) narrow open-air veranda
江上: (こうじょう) - (on the) bank of a large river
江山: (こうざん) - rivers and mountains; landscape
江川る: (えがわる) - to (try to) act like a big-shot

江戸っ子: (えどっこ) - true Tokyoite; person born and raised in Edo

江戸の仇を長崎でうつ: (えどのかたきをながさきでうつ) - to hit somebody where they least expect it; to take revenge on someone in an unlikely place; to get revenge on someone in a different contest

決まり: (きまり) - rule/regulation; settlement/conclusion/end/agreement/arrangement; habit/custom/habitual way; (usu. as 決まりが悪い, etc.)  countenance in front of another person/face; love relationship between a customer and a prostitute
